rules.name: Require HTTPS
rules.description: All sensitive requests should use HTTPS

rules.name: No Inline Secrets
rules.description: API keys and secrets should not be in client-side code

rules.name: Secure Cookies
rules.description: Session cookies must have Secure, HttpOnly, and SameSite attributes

rules.name: Security Headers Required
rules.description: CSP, HSTS, X-Frame-Options and other security headers must be present

rules.name: No JWT in LocalStorage
rules.description: JWT tokens should not be stored in localStorage/sessionStorage

rules.name: No PII Exposure
rules.description: Personal identifiable information should not be exposed in responses
